Package itunesq

Class MenuBars

java.lang.Object
org.apache.pivot.wtk.Component
org.apache.pivot.wtk.Container
org.apache.pivot.wtk.Window
org.apache.pivot.wtk.Frame
itunesq.MenuBars
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<org.apache.pivot.wtk.Component>, org.apache.pivot.beans.Bindable, org.apache.pivot.collections.Sequence<org.apache.pivot.wtk.Component>, org.apache.pivot.wtk.ConstrainedVisual, org.apache.pivot.wtk.Visual
public class MenuBars extends org.apache.pivot.wtk.Frame implements org.apache.pivot.beans.Bindable
Class that represents the menu bar for non-dialog windows.

The required functionality is not built in to Pivot, because of the need to create named actions that are driven from the menu items.

Full disclosure: the template for this class was gleefully stolen from the Pivot tutorials :)

Author:
Jon

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuBars

      public MenuBars()
      Class constructor. This creates named actions for the following menu items:
      • File -> Open
      • File -> Save
      • File -> Exit
      • Edit -> Preferences

  • Method Details

    • initializeMenuBxmlVariables

      public void initializeMenuBxmlVariables​(org.apache.pivot.beans.BXMLSerializer windowSerializer, org.apache.pivot.collections.List<org.apache.pivot.wtk.Component> components, boolean showFileSave)
      Initializes the BXML variables and data for the menu bar that appears on all primary windows.
      Parameters:
      windowSerializer - BXML serializer used to read the window BXML file
      components - list of window components that is extended with menu bar components
      showFileSave - flag that indicates whether or not to show the File -> Save menu item

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(org.apache.pivot.collections.Map<String,​Object> namespace, URL location, org.apache.pivot.util.Resources resources)
      Initializes the class after it has been completely processed and bound by the serializer. This method is required to be overriden for the Bindable interface, but does nothing.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface org.apache.pivot.beans.Bindable
      Parameters:
      namespace - serializer's namespace
      location - location of the BXML source
      resources - resources used to localize the deserialized content, or null
